mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_post (title, content, category_id, author_id, author_name, view_count, like_count, comment_count, collect_count, is_top, top_expire_time, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{categoryId}, #{authorId}, #{authorName}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{collectCount}, #{isTop}, #{topExpireTime}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT FROM community_post p LEFT JOIN community_category cc ON p.category_id = cc.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM community_post p LEFT JOIN community_category cc ON p.category_id = cc.id WHERE p.author_id = #{userId} AND p.status != 3 ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
